Package renderer

Class Camera.Builder

java.lang.Object
renderer.Camera.Builder
Enclosing class:
Camera
public static class Camera.Builder extends Object
Builder class for constructing a Camera instance.

    • setDirection

      public Camera.Builder setDirection (Vector vTo, Vector vUp)
      Sets the direction vectors of the camera.
      Parameters:
      vTo - The forward direction vector.
      vUp - The upward direction vector.
      Returns:
      The builder instance.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if vTo and vUp are not orthogonal.

    • setVpSize

      Parameters:

      height - The height of the view plane.
      Returns:
      The builder instance.

    • build

      public Camera build()
      Builds and returns the Camera instance.
      Returns:
      The built Camera instance.
      Throws:
      MissingResourceException - if any required parameter is missing.
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is invalid.
